title: Remove siblings of $ref (draft-07 and older)
description: Up to draft-07 the $ref keyword overrides every other keyword in the same object. The siblings are ignored during validation, so they can be deleted without changing behaviour.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Wrong (draft-07): $ref with sibling keywords
comprehensiveExamples.description: In ≤ draft-07, only $ref is evaluated; siblings are ignored and should be removed.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Right (2019-09+): $ref siblings may be valid (not covered by this rule)
comprehensiveExamples.description: Modern drafts permit annotations adjacent to $ref; this rule targets older drafts only.

message: Remove sibling keywords – in drafts ≤ 7 only $ref is evaluated.
